%1$s comes with some very powerful built: %1$s comes with some very powerful built-in tools:
You can exclude posts from the sitemap b: You can exclude posts from the sitemap by entering a comma separated string with the Post IDs. The format will become something like: %1$s.
You do not have to create a redirect for: You do not have to create a redirect for URL %1$s because a redirect already exists. The existing redirect points to %2$s. If this is fine you can mark this issue as fixed. If not, please go to the redirects page and change the target URL.
To be able to create a redirect and fix: To be able to create a redirect and fix this issue, you need %1$s. You can buy the plugin, including one year of support and updates, on %2$s.
Yoast plugins share some code between th: Yoast plugins share some code between them to make your site faster. As a result of that, we need all Yoast plugins to be up to date. We've detected this isn't the case, so please update the Yoast plugins that aren't up to date yet.
The %1$s data has been removed. You will: The %1$s data has been removed. You will have to reauthenticate if you want to retrieve the data again.

Errors that occurred when your site was: Errors that occurred when your site was crawled by Googlebot.
Errors that occurred only when your site: Errors that occurred only when your site was crawled by Googlebot-Mobile (errors didn't appear for desktop).
Errors that only occurred when your site: Errors that only occurred when your site was crawled by Googlebot for feature phones (errors didn't appear for desktop).
Mark this issue as fixed in %1$s.
The target URL doesn't exist, but your s: The target URL doesn't exist, but your server is not returning a 404 (file not found) error.
The %1$s plugin might cause issues when: The %1$s plugin(s) might cause issues when used in conjunction with %2$s.
Server requires authentication or is blo: Server requires authentication or is blocking Googlebot from accessing the site.
URL points to a non-existent page.
Google was unable to crawl this URL due: Google was unable to crawl this URL due to an undetermined issue.
Googlebot could access your site, but ce: Googlebot could access your site, but certain URLs are blocked for Googlebot in your %1$s file. This block could either be for all Googlebots or even specifically for Googlebot-mobile.
Request timed out or site is blocking Go: Request timed out or site is blocking Google.
You still have the default WordPress tag: You still have the default WordPress tagline, even an empty one is probably better. %1$sYou can fix this in the Customiser%2$s.
We've summarized the most recent changes: We've summarised the most recent changes in %s.
Google shows your website's name in the: Google shows your website's name in the search results, we will default to your site name but you can adapt it here. You can also provide an alternate website name you want Google to consider.
If you're running a one author blog, the: If you're running a one author blog, the author archive will be exactly the same as your homepage. This is what's called a %1$sduplicate content problem%2$s.
If this is the case on your site, you ca: If this is the case on your site, you can choose to either disable it (which makes it redirect to the homepage), or to add %s to it so it doesn't show up in the search results.
Date-based archives could in some cases: Date-based archives could in some cases also be seen as duplicate content.

To be able to access %1$sFacebook Insigh: To be able to access %1$sFacebook Insights%2$s, you need to add a user here. The name is used for reference only, the ID is used for verification.

We couldn't create a connection to our A: We couldn't create a connection to our API to verify your licence key(s). Please ask your hosting company to allow outgoing connections from your server to %s.
Your server has an outdated version of t: Your server has an outdated version of the PHP module cURL (Version: %s). Please ask your hosting company to update this to a recent version of cURL. You can read more about that in our %sKnowledge base%s.
The featured image should be at least 20: The featured image should be at least 200x200 pixels to be picked up by Facebook and other social media sites.
See the help tab for more info.
Note that not all variables can be used: Note that not all variables can be used in every template.
Both %1$s and %2$s create OpenGraph outp: Both %1$s and %2$s create OpenGraph output, which might make Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and other social networks use the wrong texts and images when your pages are being shared.
Both %1$s and %2$s can create XML sitema: Both %1$s and %2$s can create XML sitemaps. Having two XML sitemaps is not beneficial for search engines, yet might slow down your site.
To be able to access %1$sFacebook Insigh: To be able to access %1$sFacebook Insights%2$s for your site, you need to specify a Facebook Admin. This can be a user. If you have an app for your site, you could use that as well.

You can add the verification codes for t: You can add the verification codes for the different Webmaster Tools programs here. We highly encourage you to check out both Google and Bing’s Webmaster Tools.
Determine who has access to the plugins: Determine who has access to the plugins advanced settings on the post edit screen.
The first tab will show you site-wide se: The first tab will show you site-wide settings for titles, normally you'll only need to change the Title Separator.
On the archives tab you can set template: On the archives tab you can set templates for specific pages like author archives, search results and more.
On the Other tab you can change sitewide: On the Other tab you can change sitewide meta settings, like enable meta keywords.
On this tab you can verify your site wit: On this tab you can verify your site with Pinterest and enter your Pinterest account.
This plugin adds XML sitemaps to your si: This plugin adds XML sitemaps to your site. The sitemaps are automatically updated when you publish a new post, page or custom post and Google and Bing will be automatically notified.
All of the options on these tabs are for: All of the options on these tabs are for advanced users only. If you don’t know whether you should check any, don’t touch them.
The powerful functions of %1$s can be ex: The powerful functions of %1$s can be extended with %3$sYoast premium plugins%4$s. These premium plugins require the installation of %1$s or %2$s and add specific functionality. You can read all about the Yoast Premium Plugins %3$shere%4$s.

As you can see, there is a translation o: As you can see, there is a translation of this plugin in %1$s. This translation is currently %3$d%% complete. We need your help to make it complete and to fix any errors. Please register at %4$s to help complete the translation to %1$s!
You're using WordPress in %1$s. While %2: You're using WordPress in %1$s. While %2$s has been translated to %1$s for %3$d%%, it's not been shipped with the plugin yet. You can help! Register at %4$s to help complete the translation to %1$s!
You're using WordPress in a language we: You're using WordPress in a language we don't support yet. We'd love for %2$s to be translated in that language too, but unfortunately, it isn't right now. You can change that! Register at %4$s to help translate it!

There&#8217;s more to learn about WordPr: There’s more to learn about WordPress & SEO than just using this plugin. A great start is our article %1$sthe definitive guide to WordPress SEO%2$s.
This is where you\tset the titles and me: This is where you	set the titles and meta-information for all your post types, taxonomies, archives, special pages and for your homepage. The page is divided into different tabs. Make sure you check ’em all out!
Now click on the &#8216;%1$sPost Types%2: Now click on the %1$sPost Types%2$s tab, as this will be our example.
The templates are built using variables. You can find all these variables in the contextual help (in the top-right corner of the page). The settings allow you to set specific behaviour for the post types.
On this tab you can enable the %1$sFaceb: On this tab you can enable the %1$sFacebook Open Graph%2$s functionality from this plugin, as well as assign a Facebook user or Application to be the admin of your site, so you can view the Facebook insights.
The frontpage settings allow you to set: The front page settings allow you to set meta-data for your homepage, whereas the default settings allow you to set a fallback for all posts and pages without images.
With %1$sTwitter Cards%2$s, you can atta: With %1$sTwitter Cards%2$s, you can attach photos, videos and other content to create rich media experience tweets that drive traffic to your website. Simply check the box, sign up for the service, and users who tweet links to your content will have a card added to the tweet that’s visible to all of their followers.
A Sitemap is an XML file that lists the: A Sitemap is an XML file that lists the URLs for a site. It allows webmasters to include additional information about each URL: when it was last updated, how often it changes, and how important it is in relation to other URLs in the site. This allows search engines to crawl the site more intelligently.
What does the plugin do with XML Sitemap: What does the plugin do with XML Sitemaps?
If you want to exclude certain post type: If you want to exclude certain post types or taxonomies, you can also set that on this page.
Is your webserver low on memory? Decreas: Is your webserver low on memory? Decrease the entries per sitemap (default: 1000) to reduce load.
Once you&#8217;ve purchased %1$s or any: Once you’ve purchased %1$s or any other premium Yoast plugin, you’ll have to enter a licence key. You can do so on the Licences tab. Once you’ve activated your premium plugin, you can use all its powerful features.
So, we&#8217;ve come to the end of the t: So, we’ve come to the end of the tour. If you like the plugin, please %srate it 5 stars on WordPress.org%s!
You&#8217;ve just installed %1$s! Click: You’ve just installed %1$s! Click “Start Tour” to view a quick introduction of this plugin’s core functionality.
Replaced with the post/page author's 'Bi: Replaced with the post or page author's 'Biographical Info'
If you don't want to use the title for s: If you don't want to use the title for sharing on %1$s but instead want another title there, write it here.
Are you sure you want to reset your SEO: Are you sure you want to reset your SEO settings?
Choose the symbol to use as your title s: Choose the symbol to use as your title separator. This will display, for instance, between your post title and site name.
Symbols are shown in the size they'll ap: Symbols are shown in the size they'll appear in the search results.
New sites in the network inherit their S: New sites in the network inherit their SEO settings from this site
Choose the site whose settings you want: Choose the site whose settings you want to use as default for all sites that are added to your network. If you choose 'None', the normal plugin defaults will be used.
Enter the %sSite ID%s for the site whose: Enter the %sSite ID%s for the site whose settings you want to use as default for all sites that are added to your network. Leave empty for none (i.e. the normal plugin defaults will be used).
Privacy sensitive (FB admins and such),: Privacy sensitive (FB admins and such), theme specific (title rewrite) and a few very site specific settings will not be imported to new blogs.
These are the title, description and ima: These are the title, description and image values used in the Open Graph meta tags on the front page of your site.
A replacement variable can only contain: A replacement variable can only contain alphanumeric characters, an underscore or a dash. Try renaming your variable.
Warning: even though you can set the met: Warning: even though you can set the meta robots setting here, the entire site is set to noindex in the sitewide privacy settings, so these settings won't have an effect.
<b>Warning!</b> You're blocking external: Warning! You're blocking external requests which means you won't be able to get %s updates. Please add %s to %s.
Your license has expired. You must <a hr: Your licence has expired. You must extend your licence in order to use it again.
%s is network activated, you can manage: %s is network activated, you can manage your licence in the network admin licence page.
%s is network activated, please contact: %s is network activated, please contact your site administrator to manage the licence.
This site has not been activated properl: This site has not been activated properly on yoast.com and thus cannot check for future updates. Please activate your site with a valid licence key.
The premium version of %1$s with more fe: The premium version of %1$s with more features & support.
Optimize your videos to show them off in: Optimise your videos to show them off in search results and get more clicks!
Are you in Google News? Increase your tr: Are you in Google News? Increase your traffic from Google News by optimising for it!
Rank better locally and in Google Maps,: Rank better locally and in Google Maps, without breaking a sweat!
Seamlessly integrate WooCommerce with %1: Seamlessly integrate WooCommerce with %1$s and get extra features!
Prevent cleaning out Google Analytics Ca: Prevent cleaning out Google Analytics Campaign and Google AdWords Parameters.
A replacement variable can not start wit: A replacement variable can not start with %%cf_ or %%ct_ as these are reserved for the WPSEO standard variable variables for custom fields and custom taxonomies. Try making your variable name unique.
A replacement variable with the same nam: A replacement variable with the same name has already been registered. Try making your variable name more unique.
You cannot overrule a WPSEO standard var: You cannot overrule a WPSEO standard variable replacement by registering a variable with the same name. Use the wpseo_replacements filter instead to adjust the replacement value.
Replaced with the title of the parent pa: Replaced with the title of the parent page of the current page
Replaced with the current page number wi: Replaced with the current page number with context (i.e. <samp>page 2 of 4</samp>)
The Standard PHP Library (SPL) extension: The Standard PHP Library (SPL) extension seem to be unavailable. Please ask your web host to enable it.
The first true all-in-one SEO solution f: The first true all-in-one SEO solution for WordPress, including on-page content analysis, XML sitemaps and much more.
Please select a valid taxonomy for post: Please select a valid taxonomy for post type "%s"

The title &amp; metas settings for %1$s: The title & metas settings for %1$s are made up of variables that are replaced by specific values from the page when the page is displayed. The tabs on the left explain the available variables.

Please enter the maximum number of entri: Please enter the maximum number of entries per sitemap page (defaults to %s, you might want to lower this to prevent memory issues on some installs):

The default blog setting must be the num: The default blog setting must be the numeric blog id of the blog you want to use as default.
This must be an existing blog. Blog %s d: This must be an existing blog. Blog %s does not exist or has been marked as deleted.
This helps you to create cleaner URLs by: This helps you to create cleaner URLs by automatically removing the stop words from them.

You must %1$sgo to your Reading Settings: You must %1$sgo to your Reading Settings%2$s and uncheck the box for Search Engine Visibility.

If you have a Google+ page for your busi: If you have a Google+ page for your business, add that URL here and link it on your Google+ page's about page.
This prevents threaded replies from work: This prevents threaded replies from working when the user has JavaScript disabled, but on a large site can mean a huge improvement in crawl efficiency for search engines when you have a lot of comments.
Replaced with the post type single label: Replaced with the post type single label
Replaced with the post type plural label: Replaced with the post type plural label
No focus keyword was set for this page. If you do not set a focus keyword, no score can be calculated.
The keyword density is %1$s, which is ov: The keyword density is %1$s, which is over the advised %3$s maximum. The focus keyword was found %2$d times.

Take this tour to quickly learn about th: Take this tour to quickly learn about the use of this plugin.
I don't know why you'd want to use meta: I don't know why you'd want to use meta keywords, but if you want to, enable this.
This %s follows the indexation rules set: This %s follows the indexation rules set under Titles and Metas, you can override it here.
If you want to prevent /page/2/ and furt: If you want to prevent /page/2/ and further of any archive to show up in the search results, set this to "noindex".
These pages will be %s by default, so th: These pages will be %s by default, so they will never show up in search results.
If you want to restore a site to the def: If you want to restore a site to the default %s settings, press this button.
This image is used if the post/page bein: This image is used if the post/page being shared does not contain any images.
The focus keyword appears in %2$d (out o: The focus keyword appears in %2$d (out of %1$d) subheadings in the copy. While not a major ranking factor, this is beneficial.
You have not used the focus keyword in a: You have not used the focus keyword in any subheading (such as an H2) in your copy.
If you don't want to use the meta descri: If you don't want to use the meta description for sharing the post on Google+ but want another description there, write it here.
This is a settings export file for the %: This is a settings export file for the %1$s plugin by Yoast.com
The focus keyword does not appear in the: The focus keyword does not appear in the URL for this page. If you decide to rename the URL be sure to check the old URL 301 redirects to the new one!
The slug for this page is a bit long, co: The slug for this page is a bit long, consider shortening it.
The SEO title contains the focus keyword: The SEO title contains the focus keyword, at the beginning which is considered to improve rankings.
The SEO title contains the focus keyword, but it does not appear at the beginning; try and move it to the beginning.
No links appear in this page, consider a: No links appear in this page, consider adding some as appropriate.
You're linking to another page with the: You're linking to another page with the focus keyword you want this page to rank for. Consider changing that if you truly want this page to rank.
This page has %1$s outbound link(s), all: This page has %1$s outbound link(s), all nofollowed.
This page has %1$s nofollowed link(s) an: This page has %1$s nofollowed link(s) and %2$s normal outbound link(s).
No images appear in this page, consider: No images appear in this page. Consider adding some as appropriate.
The images on this page are missing alt: The images on this page are missing alt attributes.
The images on this page do not have alt: The images on this page do not have alt attributes containing the focus keyword.
In the specified meta description, consi: In the specified meta description, consider: How does it compare to the competition? Could it be made more appealing?
The meta description is under %1$d chara: The meta description is under %1$d characters, however up to %2$d characters are available.
The specified meta description is over %: The specified meta description is over %1$d characters. Reducing it will ensure the entire description is visible.
No meta description has been specified,: No meta description has been specified. Search engines will display copy from the page instead.
A meta description has been specified, b: A meta description has been specified, but it does not contain the focus keyword.
The keyword density is %1$s, which is to: The keyword density is %1$s, which is too low; the focus keyword was found %2$d times.
The keyword density is %1$s, which is wa: The keyword density is %1$s, which is way over the advised %3$s maximum; the focus keyword was found %2$d times.
The keyword density is %1$s, which is gr: The keyword density is %1$s, which is great; the focus keyword was found %2$d times.
The focus keyword doesn't appear in the: The focus keyword doesn't appear in the first paragraph of the copy. Make sure the topic is clear immediately.
The focus keyword appears in the first p: The focus keyword appears in the first paragraph of the copy.
The copy scores %1$s in the %2$s test, w: The copy scores %1$s in the %2$s test, which is considered %3$s to read. %4$s
Try to make shorter sentences to improve: Try to make shorter sentences to improve readability.
Try to make shorter sentences, using les: Try to make shorter sentences, using fewer difficult words to improve readability.
Huge SEO Issue: You're blocking access t: Huge SEO Issue: You're blocking access to robots.
Using this form you can reset a site to: Using this form you can reset a site to the default SEO settings.
No doubt you've used an SEO plugin befor: If this site isn't new, you may have used an SEO plugin before. You can import the existing data below. If you want, you can import first, check if it was imported correctly, and then import and delete. No duplicate data will be imported.
If you've used another SEO plugin, try t: If you've used another SEO plugin, try the %sSEO Data Transporter%s plugin to move your data into this plugin, it rocks!
Delete the old data after import? (recom: Delete the old data after import? (recommended)
Export your %1$s settings here, to impor: Export your %1$s settings here, to import them again later or to import them on another site.
You can determine the title and descript: You can determine the title and description for the front page by %sediting the front page itself »%s

Enforce a trailing slash on all category: Enforce a trailing slash on all category and tag URLs
If you choose a permalink for your posts: If you choose a permalink for your posts with %1$s, or anything else but a %2$s at the end, this will force WordPress to add a trailing slash to non-post pages nonetheless.
Redirect attachment URLs to parent post: Redirect attachment URLs to parent post URL.
Attachments to posts are stored in the d: Attachments to posts are stored in the database as posts, this means they're accessible under their own URLs if you do not redirect them, enabling this will redirect them to the post they were attached to.
Redirect ugly URLs to clean permalinks. (Not recommended in many cases!)
People make mistakes in their links towa: People may make mistakes in their links towards you, or unwanted parameters are added to the end of your URLs. This allows you to redirect them all away. Please note that while this is a feature that is actively maintained, it is known to break several plugins, and should for that reason be the first feature you disable when you encounter issues after installing this plugin.
Prevent cleaning out Google Site Search: Prevent cleaning out Google Site Search URLs.
Google Site Search URLs look weird, and: Google Site Search URLs look weird, and ugly, but if you're using Google Site Search, you probably do not want them cleaned out.
How to insert breadcrumbs in your theme: How to insert breadcrumbs in your theme
If your robots.txt were writable, you co: If your robots.txt were writable, you could edit it from here.
If your .htaccess were writable, you cou: If your .htaccess were writable, you could edit it from here.
This feature is used to automatically ad: This feature is used to automatically add content to your RSS. More specifically, it's meant to add links back to your blog and your blog posts. Dumb scrapers will automatically add these links too, helping search engines identify you as the original source of the content.
Content to put before each post in the f: Content to put before each post in the feed
You can use the following variables with: You can use the following variables within the content and they will be replaced by the value on the right.
A link to the archive for the post autho: A link to the archive for the post author, with the authors name as anchor text.
A link to the post, with the title as an: A link to the post, with the title as anchor text.
A link to your site, with your site's na: A link to your site, with your site's name as anchor text.
A link to your site, with your site's name and description as anchor text.
You can find your XML Sitemap here: %sXM: You can find your XML Sitemap here: %sXML Sitemap%s
You do <strong>not</strong> need to gene: You do not need to generate the XML sitemap, nor will it take up time to generate after publishing a post.
Save your settings to activate your XML: Save your settings to activate your XML Sitemap.
The following file(s) is/are blocking yo: The following file(s) is/are blocking your XML sitemaps from working properly:
Either delete them (this can be done wit: Either delete them (this can be done with the "Fix it" button) or disable %1$s XML sitemaps.
You do not have your postname in the URL: You do not have your postname in the URL of your posts and pages, it is highly recommended that you do. Consider setting your permalink structure to <var>/%postname%/</var>.
You can use the boxes below to verify wi: You can use the boxes below to verify with the different Webmaster Tools. If your site is already verified, you can just forget about these. Enter the verify meta values for:
Title to use for Author page: Title to use for Author page

The canonical link is shown on the archi: The canonical link is shown on the archive page for this term.
The Breadcrumbs title is used in the bre: The Breadcrumbs title is used in the breadcrumbs where this %s appears.
If you type something above it will over: If you type something above it will override your %smeta keywords template%s.

Title to use for this page in breadcrumb: Title to use for this page in breadcrumb paths
The canonical URL that this page should: The canonical URL that this page should point to, leave empty to default to permalink. %sCross domain canonical%s supported too.
The URL that this page should redirect t: The URL that this page should redirect to.
Admin only notice: this page doesn't sho: Admin only notice: this page doesn't show a meta description because it doesn't have one, either write it for this page specifically or go into the SEO -> Titles menu and set up a template.
